ConnectivityChanged - Class in com.github.pwittchen.networkevents.library.event
Event pushed to Otto Event Bus when ConnectivityStatus changes; E.g. when WiFi is turned on or off or when mobile network is turned on or off it also occurs when WiFi is on, but there is no Internet connection or when there is Internet connection or when device goes off-line
ConnectivityChanged(ConnectivityStatus, Logger, Context) - Constructor for class com.github.pwittchen.networkevents.library.event.ConnectivityChanged
